message:
Euphoric atmosphere at West Bengal rallies. People are tired of Trinamool Congress, Left & see BJP as a ray of hope.

Left & AITC have done great injustice to WB's poor. BJP seeks an opportunity to serve WB & fulfil dreams & aspirations of the state's youth. Those in power in WB snatch people's money through chit funds. We have initiated Jan Dhan Yojana to give poor bank accounts & empower them.

Ally with the Left in West Bengal & criticise them in Kerala…people can see through double standards of Congress. 
http://nm-4.com/iupl
